<a id="VisualShaderNodeCubemap"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeCubemap

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A [Cubemap](Cubemap.md) sampling node to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Translated to ``texture(cubemap, vec3)`` in the shader language. Returns a color vector and alpha channel as scalar.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_Source"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Source**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_Source)

<a id="VisualShaderNodeCubemap_constant_SOURCE_TEXTURE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Source](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_Source) **SOURCE_TEXTURE** = `0`

Use the [Cubemap](Cubemap.md) set via [cube_map](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#VisualShaderNodeCubemap_property_cube_map). If this is set to [source](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#VisualShaderNodeCubemap_property_source), the ``samplerCube`` port is ignored.<a id="VisualShaderNodeCubemap_constant_SOURCE_PORT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Source](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_Source) **SOURCE_PORT** = `1`

Use the [Cubemap](Cubemap.md) sampler reference passed via the ``samplerCube`` port. If this is set to [source](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#VisualShaderNodeCubemap_property_source), the [cube_map](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#VisualShaderNodeCubemap_property_cube_map) texture is ignored.<a id="VisualShaderNodeCubemap_constant_SOURCE_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Source](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_Source) **SOURCE_MAX** = `2`

Represents the size of the [Source](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_Source) enum.<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_TextureType"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **TextureType**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_TextureType)

<a id="VisualShaderNodeCubemap_constant_TYPE_DATA"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TextureType](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_TextureType) **TYPE_DATA** = `0`

No hints are added to the uniform declaration.<a id="VisualShaderNodeCubemap_constant_TYPE_COLOR"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TextureType](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_TextureType) **TYPE_COLOR** = `1`

Adds ``source_color`` as hint to the uniform declaration for proper sRGB to linear conversion.<a id="VisualShaderNodeCubemap_constant_TYPE_NORMAL_MAP"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TextureType](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_TextureType) **TYPE_NORMAL_MAP** = `2`

Adds ``hint_normal`` as hint to the uniform declaration, which internally converts the texture for proper usage as normal map.<a id="VisualShaderNodeCubemap_constant_TYPE_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TextureType](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_TextureType) **TYPE_MAX** = `3`

Represents the size of the [TextureType](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_TextureType) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Property Descriptions

<a id="VisualShaderNodeCubemap_property_cube_map"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[TextureLayered](TextureLayered.md) **cube_map** [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeCubemap_property_cube_map)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_cube_map**\ (\ value\: [TextureLayered](TextureLayered.md)\ )
- [TextureLayered](TextureLayered.md) **get_cube_map**\ (\ )

The [Cubemap](Cubemap.md) texture to sample when using [SOURCE_TEXTURE](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#VisualShaderNodeCubemap_constant_SOURCE_TEXTURE) as [source](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#VisualShaderNodeCubemap_property_source).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

- [Source](VisualShaderNodeCubemap.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeCubemap_Source) **get_source**\ (\ )

Defines which source should be used for the sampling.
